content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max,

It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate that this apartment is newly built and in the city center. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 500 euros per month is a very low offer considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I cannot accept such a price. How about 800 euros per month? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your point. However, 800 euros is too high for me as a student. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month, which is a reasonable price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 600 euros per month is still not enough for me to cover the costs of this apartment. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that offer. Let's find a middle ground. How about 700 euros per month? This is a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 700 euros is still a bit high for me. However, I understand that it is also a fair price for this apartment. As a student, I can't afford to pay more than 650 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm sorry, but 650 euros per month is simply not enough for me to consider renting out this apartment. I need to cover my expenses and make a profit. I'm willing to negotiate, but I cannot go below 700 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your position. However, as a student, I cannot afford to pay more than 650 euros per month. I appreciate your time and consideration, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still too high for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm sorry to hear that. If you're unable to meet my asking price, then I respect your decision. We will not be able to reach an agreement at this time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
